text: Edward McKenna (10 March 1950 â€“ 19 January 2019), was a Scottish drummer. He played with bands including The Sensational Alex Harvey Band, Rory Gallagher, and the Michael Schenker Group. He toured with Ian Gillan for a short time in 1990, alongside fellow former SAHB member, bassist Chris Glen. He lectured in Applied Arts at North Glasgow College from 1996 to 2011. McKenna died of a cerebral hemorrhage on 19 January 2019 at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Musicians from East Dunbartonshire Category:British rock drummers
title: Ted McKenna
